id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

model.docs:
**string**: The display model to use. One of the following options:
  * `TTGO TDisplay 135x240`
  
  * `Adafruit Funhouse 240x240`
  
  * `Adafruit RR 280x240` (round-rectangular display – some pixels are “deleted” from corners to form rounded shape)
  
  * `Adafruit S2 TFT FEATHER 240X135`
  
  * `LILYGO T-Embed 170X320`
  
  * `Waveshare 1.47in 172X320` (round-rectangular display – some pixels are “deleted” from corners to form rounded shape)
  
  * `Custom` For other displays not listed above
  
  

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

reset_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The RESET pin. Defaults depends `model`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

dc_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The DC pin. Defaults depends `model`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

backlight_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The display’s backlight pin. May be required depending on the hardware configuration. To disable a preset backlight pin (e.g. if controlled by another component) set this to `no`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

power_supply.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The [power supply](https://esphome.io/components/power_supply.html) to connect to this display if required by hardware. The power supply will be turned on before attempting to initialize the display.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

eightbitcolor.docs:
**boolean**: Limits the supported color depth to eight bits. May be useful on memory-constrained devices. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

height.docs:
**int**: Sets height of display in pixels. Defaults depends `model`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

width.docs:
**int**: Sets width of display. Defaults depends `model`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

offset_height.docs:
**int**: When `model` is set to “Custom”, use this to specify the display’s vertical offset in pixels. This option may not be specified when the `model` is not set to “Custom”. Defaults depends `model`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

offset_width.docs:
**int**: When `model` is set to “Custom”, use this to specify the display’s horizontal offset in pixels. This option may not be specified when the `model` is not set to “Custom”. Defaults depends `model`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to re-draw the screen. Defaults to `5s`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

data_rate.docs:
**frequency**: The SPI data rate (default 20MHz.) Can be reduced if required, e.g. to compensate for long data cables.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

spi_mode.docs:
**0-3**: The SPI clock mode to use (default: `mode0`.) The ST7789V datasheet specifies mode 0, but some displays appear to require mode 3. This should be one of `mode0`, `mode1`, `mode2` or `mode3` (or just a digit from 0-3.)

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*

cs_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The CS pin. Defaults depends `model`.

*See also: [ST7789V TFT LCD](https://esphome.io/components/display/st7789v.html#configuration-variables)*
